features: 🖌🎨[Anzon Mories Watercolor Lined Stationary Paper & Self-Sealing Envelope Set] assorted with 8 designed with cute border, 6 sheets of stationery paper and 4 Pcs of matching colored self-sticking envelopes each designs. Measurement: Stationary paper: 8.5 x 11 inch / 216 x 279 mm; Envelope: 4.75 x 8.7 inch / 120 x 220 mm

🖌🎨[Heavy Weight Stationery Writing Paper with Envelopes] Made of 21lb/100gsm heavy weight decorative writing paper to prevent bleeding and ghosting. Friendly with fountain pen or gel pen. Smooth finished surface: nice touching and writing on it. The self-adhesive envelope made of 24lb/120gsm extra heavy weight paper suitable for mailing and postal.
🖨[Compatible] Compatible with inkjet and laser printers. You can easily create your own masterpiece in Microsoft Word, Mac Page, Google Doc, Ai, or any common apps to bright up your recipients.

🖌🎨[Versatile] 48 sheets of pastel-color writing paper mix packs with water-colors on both sides of the papers, while college rule lines and kawaii borders are printed the front side. Suitable for hand writing a letter to family or friends, calligraphy handwriting heartfelt message.
Warranty: You have 30 days to initiate a return with a full refund after purchase.
body.description: Anzon Mories Watercolor Stationery Paper with Envelopes Set (48 Sheets + 24 Pcs) Measurement: Mix Colored Stationary Paper: 8.5 x 11 inch / 216 x 279 mm Standard US Letter Size Self-Sealing Envelope: 4.75 x 8.7 inch / 120 x 220 mm Color Theme: Watercolor, Pastel-Color Material Stationery paper: 21 lb / 100 gsm Heavy Weight Thick Paper with Smooth Finished： Suitable for Handwriting, Calligraphy without Bleeding and Ghosting Self-Sticking Envelope: 24 lb /120 gsm Extra Heavy Weight Paper No problem with Mailing and Postal. Quantity: Stationary Paper: 6 Sheets Per Designs, 48 Sheets in Total Envelope: 3 Pieces Per Designs, 24 Pc in Total Feature: 1.Double-Sides Watercolor Decoration Printed 2.Lined on Front Side with Adorable Border Design Special for Writing 3.Unlined Back Side for Special Art Work 4.Inkjet / Laser Printers Friendly, Type-Writers Friendly 5.Zero Hesitate: 30 Days Free Return and Full Refund

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality and variety!
reviews.reviewText: So many colors to choose from, lots of extra paper per color so you can write multiple pages per letter. Very durable and high quality paper. Standard paper size, fits well in envelopes. Strong seal, works great with wax sealing as well. Light weight paper so regular postage can be used, while still being thick enough that pens do not bleed through to the back.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I was a little hesitant to purchase stationery paper from Amazon because I was scared the quality was gonna be terrible. Like, what if it's super thin or the design is blurry like some cheap MS paint printout or something but having been unable to find proper 8.5x11 paper with a nice design anywhere, I decided to take the plunge and bought this.I am so happy I did!! The paper is the best paper I've bought this decade probably! It's not SUPER thick where it's annoying but it's thick enough where my G-2 pilot pens do not show through on the other side. I press down really hard when I write also so the outlines can be felt, but at no part did the ink bleed through.The watercolor on the paper was beautiful, exactly as pictured and it was a quality print, no unintended blurred lines from what I saw. The little hearts and stars on some of the papers look very nice. The design is on both sides so I did write on both sides and it was eligible after I was done writing.Overall, super super happy with the purchase. I've added other designs the same seller is selling and will be buying them also! I did feel a little weird sticking such beautiful paper in a plain white envelope though...Only con is that the packaging was pretty terrible. They throw all the paper in a little thin plastic container ad that container got thrown into a paper bag. I think something heavy was on the packaging because every page had a small crease on the top center of it, but it wasn't noticeable after I filled out the paper.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I love the colors.
reviews.reviewText: The pages are lined but they could be a little more clearly defined.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this paper to write to my penpals. The quality of the paper is very good, and I love the different pattern variations.

reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my Grandaughters who are learning letter writing in school. I think it was bright beautiful mesh of colors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Colorful and beautiful
reviews.reviewText: I liked the different colors and designs. Only drawback was the lines are very faint to see where you're writing. I guess so that it doesn't look like writing paper with lines.
